info.name: Removes the ADS from Ogame.ORG, Universe16
info.description:
This script removes the ads from www.ogame.org, for Universe 16. for the other universes and websites, you have to add the same css but for a corresponding domain.

This is how you do it: copy paste the same code, after this one, and then change == domain("gfsrv.net") == to == domain("ogame.org") == or whatever your server is.
